title: the red boarder
body: i dislike the red boarders any one else with me

replies.body: give it 2 weeks and you wont even notice that it was ever any other colour

Wrong, Rogue master race.

Anyone else here manage to get a 50 with yellow bars?
i thought i was vsing Bungie for Recon armour when i first saw it.
Now that is an old reference to Halo 3.
